star_recon_menu_desc: Settings for recon enemies and spawn behaviour during assault. More detailed explanations in mod folder.
recon_enemy_set_desc: Which enemies to use. Most noticable below overkill difficulty.
recon_murky_set_desc: Which enemies to use for murkywater recon. Doesn't affect 'SMG Swat' or 'Assault groups' enemy sets.
recon_assault_condition_desc: Under what condition will recon enemies spawn during an assault
recon_allow_reinforce_desc: If enabled, restores the reinforce task as well.
